Templates

There must be a two templates in the Jekyll includes path; pnefor individual comments and one for the comments section as a whole. Filenames can be set in _config.yaml.

The following variables are available:

There must be a two templates in the Jekyll includes path; pnefor individual comments and one for the comments section as a whole. Filenames can be set in _config.yaml.

The following variables are available:

Comments template

Variable Description Boolean; false if this is the top level of comments The comments on this thread level Link to the file and line no of the comment section on GitHub’s edit pageThere must be a two templates in the Jekyll includes path; pnefor individual comments and one for the comments section as a whole. Filenames can be set in _config.yaml.

The following variables are available:

Comments template
